alert.note: Alert for Adair; Carroll; Chariton; Linn; Livingston; Macon; Putnam; Randolph; Schuyler; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 2:50AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Missouri. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
